properties.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 8:11PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* At 811 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were
tracking a strong shower over Highland Beach, moving southeast at 5 to 10
mph.

* Funnel clouds possible with this strong shower.

* Locations impacted include...
Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Delray Beach, Highland Beach, Boca Del
Mar, Kings Point, Boca Pointe, Gulf Stream, Morikami Park, Fau
South Campus, Boca West and Villages Of Oriole.
properties.instruction:
This activity was also developing in an environment favorable for the
formation of funnel clouds. Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and
local media for additional updates and possible warnings.

To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement
agency. You can also share your report with NWS Miami on Facebook and
Twitter.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SOUTHEASTERN PALM BEACH COUNTY UNTIL 845 PM EST
